page.title: 10Health L.parish H.priors
page.content: 04400144 There is {no }resident{doctor }in Longparish or Hurstbourne Priors,but doctors from Andover hold a surgery every Tuesday at a private house,52 Northacre,Longparish.Most patients who attend are pensioners who cannot travel to Andover very easily.A { {chiropodist }comes once a month to the village hall with a mobile surgery. The patients tend to be pensioners. People from Hurstbourne Priors have to travel to attend a doctors surgery. Most villagers go to Whitchurch. { {District nurses }visit patients in their homes at the doctors request. The nearest{dental surgeries are}at Andover and Whitchurch.{Ambulance {stations}are also located in both these towns.
